amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the use of any federal funds to create National monuments in Malheur County, Oregon under the Antiquities Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bentz amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bentz amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bentz amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
